title: AMX is Future!
text: The audience there is certainly quite different from the one involved in traditional markets; itâ€™s the generation of WallStreetBets betting against the giant hedge funds, the heirs of Banksy who destroyed his artwork. So perhaps the NFT craze itself will be short lived, but more importantly it could represent a larger shift in where the digital economy is headed. It is first and foremost disruptive, for better or worse.
